articles.title: PM Modi embarks on 5-day tour to Cyprus, Canada and Croatia today. Check full itinerary here
articles.description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi embarks on a significant three-nation tour to Cyprus, Canada, and Croatia. This historic trip marks his first foreign visit post-Operation Sindoor and aims to strengthen bilateral ties and engage with global leaders at the G-7 Summit.

articles.title: Two minor siblings drown in Chenab river
creator: Daily Excelsior
articles.description: Excelsior Correspondent DODA, June 14: In a tragic incident reported from Nepali Pul area, two minor boys-Abrar and Asrar, sons of Farooq Ahmed and residents of Nepali Pul-reportedly drowned in the River Chenab on Friday evening. The boys, aged approximately 10 and 12 years, were playing cricket with a group of children at a location not far from the riverbank when the unfortunate event occurred. According to sources, the incident took place around 6 PM when the cricket ball went [...]The post Two minor siblings drown in Chenab river appeared first on Daily Excelsior.

articles.title: ACB files chargesheet against engineers, contractor in drainage scam
creator: Daily Excelsior
articles.description: Excelsior Correspondent 15JAMMU, June 14: The Jammu and Kashmir Anti-Corruption Bureau (ACB) has filed a chargesheet in a corruption case involving officers of the Town Drainage Division Jammu and a contractor, for misappropriation of Government funds during the execution of drainage works in Doda district. articles.title: State Taxes Dept cracks down on defaulting taxpayers across Jammu
creator: Our Correspondent
articles.description: Jammu and Kashmir's State Taxes Department conducted raids to combat tax evasion in Jammu. The department targeted invoice trading, fake e-way bills, and fraudulent tax credits. Inspections involved verifying records, assessing stock, and cross-referencing data. The goal is to protect revenue, enforce GST laws, and encourage honest business practices. Violators face penalties and legal action. (This summary is generated via AI.)

articles.title: Addressing issues of genocide, carving of separate homeland core issues: KPs
creator: Daily Excelsior
articles.description: Excelsior Correspondent JAMMU, June 14: Reiterating that addressing the issue of genocide and carving out of separate homeland within Kashmir Valley is core issue for lakhs of Kashmiri Pandits who were hounded out of Valley by Pakistan sponsored terrorism in 1989 and 1990, the community activists, prominent leaders and intellectuals who met here today made it amply clear that there will be no compromise on these two basic issues. This was a general view in a meeting organised by Panun [...]The post Addressing issues of genocide, carving of separate homeland core issues: KPs appeared first on Daily Excelsior.

articles.title: DC Ramban for public-centric governance
creator: Daily Excelsior
articles.description: Excelsior Correspondent RAMBAN, June 14: Deputy Commissioner Mohammad Alyas Khan, today chaired an introductory meeting with District and Sectoral Officers. The meeting marked his first formal interaction with the administrative machinery of the district after taking over as DC Ramban. He stressed on evolving a result-oriented, inclusive, and responsive governance model to ensure holistic development and efficient public service delivery. The meeting was attended by Additional Deputy Commissioner Varunjeet Singh Charak; Assistant Commissioner Revenue Shokat Hayat Mattoo; Chief Planning Officer [...]The post DC Ramban for public-centric governance appeared first on Daily Excelsior.

articles.title: MLA Ramnagar inaugurates motorable bridge at Veriyan
creator: Daily Excelsior
articles.description: Excelsior Correspondent RAMNAGAR, June 14: In a major boost to rural infrastructure and connectivity, MLA Ramnagar, Dr Sunil Bhardwaj, today inaugurated a newly constructed motorable bridge at Veriyan, Kulwanta, connecting the remote hamlets of Chigla Balota with Kulthian Marta. The bridge, constructed under the Pradhan Mantri Gram Sadak Yojana (PMGSY), has been completed at a cost of Rs 2 crores. The bridge is a crucial development for the region, addressing a long-standing public demand and providing all-weather access to the [...]The post MLA Ramnagar inaugurates motorable bridge at Veriyan appeared first on Daily Excelsior.

articles.title: Govt employees to hold protest on June 17

articles.description: Excelsior Correspondent SRINAGAR, June 14: The Employees Joint Consultative Committee (EJCC), a platform of employee unions, has announced a symbolic protest on June 17 in response to the authorities’ consistent neglect of the long-standing and legitimate demands of lakhs of permanent and temporary employees, as well as the recent policies against employees of Jammu and Kashmir by JK Bank. . articles.title: STD cracks down on defaulting taxpayers
creator: Daily Excelsior
articles.description: Excelsior Correspondent JAMMU, June 14: In a major enforcement action against tax evasion, Jammu and Kashmir State Taxes Department (STD) conducted simultaneous search and seizure operations at multiple locations across Jammu division. During the enforcement actions, the department targeted malpractices like Invoice Trading Without Supply (issuance of invoices without the actual supply of goods or services, falsely inflating transactions to claim ITC), Fake E-Way Bills with No Toll Record Movement (Generation of fraudulent E-Way Bills showing no corresponding vehicle movement [...]The post STD cracks down on defaulting taxpayers appeared first on Daily Excelsior.
